text: Tony McNamara (3 October 1929 - 30 May 2015) was an English footballer who played as a midfielder. He played for Everton, Liverpool, Crewe Alexandra, Bury and Runcorn between 1947 and 1960. He was born in Liverpool. NcNamara died on 30 May 2015 in Liverpool, aged 85. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2015 deaths Category:English footballers Category:Sportspeople from Liverpool Category:Everton F.C. players Category:Liverpool F.C. players
title: Tony McNamara
